summary: This is an email forwarding a legal complaint filed by 'Doe' against the Epstein estate. The email is from Brad Edwards, an attorney, and includes the complaint as an attachment.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: He is the sender of the forwarded email containing the legal complaint against the Epstein estate.

events.title: Forwarding of Legal Complaint
events.description: Attorney Brad Edwards forwards a legal complaint filed by an anonymous plaintiff ('Doe') against the Epstein estate.

keyFacts: A legal complaint was filed by an anonymous plaintiff ('Doe') against the Epstein estate.
Attorney Brad Edwards was involved in forwarding the complaint on March 23, 2020.
The document is an email correspondence with an attached legal filing.
